title: The Fearless Vampire Killers (1967) (Roman Polanski, Sharon Tate
description:
THE FEARLESS VAMPIRE KILLERS - 1967

  This campy monster comedy stars Jack MacGowran and Roman Polanski as a clunky but heroic pair of vampire killers. Called upon to rescue the beautiful and buxom daughter (Sharon Tate) of an innkeeper from a Draculalike bloodsucker, the duo muddle through all sorts of scrapes, the most intense being a scene in which a room full of dancing vampires realize the human interlopers are the only ones in the room who are reflected in a mirror. Scary and funny, the film has some unforgettable set pieces, and a terrific score.

  Starring: Jack MacGowran, Roman Polanski, Sharon Tate, Alfie Bass.

  Directed by: Roman Polanski.

  Quality: Very Good Xvid from DVD.

  Length: 1hr. 43min.

  Language: English.

  Size: 688 x 320
